name: Maryland Casualty Company, Appellant, v. Darby Township
name_abbreviation: Maryland Casualty Co. v. Darby Township

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Maryland Casualty Company, Appellant, v. Darby Township.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
The judgment of the court below entered in this declaratory judgment proceeding is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Sweney for the court en banc, reported in 20 Pa. D. & C. 2d 543.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: Robert B. Greer, with him Leon 8. Forman, and Wexler, Mulder & Weisman, and Butler, Beatty, Greer & Johnson, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Maryland Casualty Company, Appellant, v. Darby Township.
Argued April 27, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Eagen, JJ.
Robert B. Greer, with him Leon 8. Forman, and Wexler, Mulder & Weisman, and Butler, Beatty, Greer & Johnson, for appellant.
John F. Cramp, for appellee.
May 23, 1960:
